resources.string: Always try to perform with a comfortable tempo
Be emotional if you feel good
Use different layers of rhythm to make variance
Take use of features for different devices
Be happy to create you own masterpiece
1. Access performance mode by clicking top-right button
2. When you are in performance mode, touch "Click" to start performance
3. Adjust position of your phone as you wish
4. Touch screen to generate sound effect and consecutive touch will not interrupt sound.
5. Double short touch will clear exist image, don\'t worry about audio functionality
